code.title: Macro script that is triggered by 'GET /v1/macro/run' call that can add log entries for GET /v1/macro/log. GET parameters can be processed. getArgs(), callProc(), addLog(), resolve(), reject(), print() are customized methods
Periodically run script that can add log entries for GET /v1/macro/log. callProc(), addLog(), print() are customized methods

pollInterval.title: Script polling interval in MINUTES. -1 disables polling. Aligned with the start of hour. Eg. 30 means checking on :0,:30 every hour. 20 means :0,:20,:40. 45 means :0 and :45.
